1001.name: Free Rotate
1001.desc: Tap the selected area to <color=#F48800>rotate 90Â° clockwise</color>.

1002.name: Reset
1002.desc: After placing a block in each round, you will <color=#F48800>directly proceed to the next round</color>.

1003.name: Lucky Round
1003.desc: Every three rounds, <color=#F48800>a special block of one to three squares</color> will be created. Placing any of the blocks ends the round.

1004.name: Multiplier Change
1004.desc: The total time is reduced by <color=#F48800>50</color>s, and the <color=#F48800>elimination score and placement score</color> multipliers are greatly increased.

1005.name: Building Strength
1005.desc:
Whenever a block is placed on the board and is not eliminated, you <color=#F48800>accumulate charge</color>.
Once a block is eliminated, <color=#F48800>charge is cleared</color>, and you get elimination points in proportion to the charge multiplier.

1006.name: Multiplier
1006.desc:
Whenever elimination is triggered, <color=#F48800>the multiplier increases and the countdown resets to 10s</color>. When the countdown ends, the multiplier is reset.
When elimination is triggered, your elimination score goes up in proportion to the multiplier.
